I've made this rip... still the credits goes to the actual cracking groups.
Credits:

(Reloaded) - Spore
(Battery) - Spore Update 1.03
(Skidrow) - Spore Galactic Adventures
(Netshow) - Spore Galactic Adventures "Fixed Image"
(Euphoria) - Spore Creepy & Cute
(Battery) - Spore Update 1.05.0001

Thanks to this people out there now you can play the game with the last patch.
I just RIP the game and made portable version, because to install everything from actual releases one by one it takes much more time and for my surprise even more hard disk space.

So install the game, mount the fixed image iso in Virtual CD Control Panel or PowerISO (with other apps just don't work) and play both Spore or Spore Glalactic adventures with the last avaiable futures that original game have.

NOTE: You will be not able to update this release with newer patch, because this game already have the last patch applied and because when prepatching you will get a error message that the game is not installed.

So, if some new patch came up from EA I'll make new portable release.
:)
